pages.text: $(li)The Leather is a resistant material that can be dropped by $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/cow)Cows$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/environmental/deer)Deers$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/donkey)Donkeys$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/quark/foxhound)Foxhounds$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/goblins_and_dungeons/goblo)Goblos$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/goblins_and_dungeons/goom)Gooms$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/goblins_and_dungeons/hobgob)Hobgobs$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/hoglin)Hoglins$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/horse)Horses$(/l), $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/llama)Llamas$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/buzzier_bees/moobloom)Mooblooms$(/l), $(l:patchouli:creatures/vanilla/mooshroom)Mooshrooms$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:pets/vanilla/mule)Mules$(/l).$(br)$(li)They can be used to craft multiples items in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).

$(li)The Leather can be found in Loot Chests too.$(br)$(li)It can be crafted with $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/vanilla/rabbit_hide)Rabbit Hide$(/l), $(l:patchouli:miscellaneous/alexsmobs/kangaroo_hide)Kangaroo Hide$(/l), or $(l)Bonded Leather$() too.
